amendment.description: Amendment establishes a declaration of policy regarding the crisis in Albania and urges the U.S. to support the new government as it attempts to reestablish calm and achieve political reconciliation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing the sense of Congress that the policy of the United States should support the new unity government in albania and shoudl urge the government to guarantee human rights and free elections in that country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
